title: Opensource Scans
content: ### OpenSource Audits: Using OpenSource plugins Mixeway can download results from OpenSource scans which is crucial source of information for security quality gateway. **_Avaliable integrations:_** ### Discovery In case of OpenSource scanning Mixeway is sharing REST API which is meant to download results of an audit. ### Integration goal * Get Report ### Recommended usage OpenSource scanning should be done right before merge or pull request along with source code security audit. Merge/Pull should be done based on the results from the test.
